Resources.name: Chronometer
Resources.notes: A tool to track your meals and nutrition, with interactive visualized analytics

Resources.name: Dropbox paper
Resources.notes: A simple yet robust note-taking tool that you can organize using folders on dropbox. Offers code formatting, checklists, timelines, embedded links and more.

Resources.name: Thomas Frank
Resources.notes: This YouTube channel is a rich resource for productivity and study tips and tools.

Resources.name: Notion
Resources.notes: A highly-customizable note-taking and organiztional app. It's a place to take notes, log information, plan tasks, setup schedules and more.

Resources.name: Trello
Resources.notes: Like pinterest for your to-dos! A place to store boards of lists and cards, akin to an office sticky-note wall or corkboard.

Resources.name: Timer Tab
Resources.notes: A minmal all-in-one timer, stopwatch and alarmclock page

Resources.name: Degreed
Resources.notes: A tool to help you track and share your learning journeys

Resources.name: Anki
Resources.notes: A flashcard program based on spaced repitition to help with memorization. Handy for language learning!

Resources.name: Libby
Resources.notes: A library app that offers access to your local library's digital and audio books

Resources.name: Talks at Google
Resources.notes: Talks held at Google's global headquarters. Talks feature interesting conversations with authors, directors and more.
